LQMG Maven Plugin

Introduction

This maven plugin can be used to generate QueryDSL metadata classes from Liquibase changeLog files in the way that the changeLog files are placed into OSGi bundles.

Usage

Although it is possible to configure the plugin in the way that it is attached to an execution, it is not recommended. As the schema does not change every day, we normally use the plugin from the command line. E.g.:

  mvn org.everit.osgi.dev:lqmg-maven-plugin:generate -Dlqmg.schema=mySchema

For more information about the configuration possibilities, see the plugin-info page.
